thread.title: Dr. Joshua Kreithen of Holcomb - Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa Now Offers Allergans NATRELLE INSPIRA Round Gel-Filled Breast Implants
thread.title_full: Dr. Joshua Kreithen of Holcomb - Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa Now Offers Allergans NATRELLE INSPIRA Round Gel-Filled Breast Implants - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Dr. Joshua Kreithen of Holcomb - Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa Now Offers Allergans NATRELLE INSPIRA Round Gel-Filled Breast Implants
text:
New Breast Implant Line Offers Over 200 Size and Shape Options to Create a Highly Personalized Appearance
Sarasota, Florida (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
Holcomb – Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa, PLLC, one of the leading plastic surgery practices in Florida, is pleased to announce that Dr. Joshua Kreithen, M.D. is now offering Allergan’s Natrelle INSPIRA round, gel-filled breast implants to women seeking increased breast fullness through reconstruction, augmentation or revision surgery.
Natrelle INSPIRA implants, which recently received FDA approval, represent a new option in aesthetic and reconstructive breast implant surgery. They were designed to provide a soft feel while giving a fuller and more round appearance to the breast. INSPIRA implants are available in over 200 sizes and shapes to provide a customized fit based on individual body type, size, and goals.
Commenting on the announcement, Dr. Kreithen said, “We are excited to offer the Natrelle INSPIRA implant line at our downtown Sarasota office, and I look forward to helping each patient find the exact look they desire. We encourage patients interested in this innovation to contact us today to schedule a consultation.”
About Joshua Kreithen, M.D.
Joshua Kreithen, M.D. is a board-certified plastic surgery specialist with over 18 years of experience. Dr. Kreithen is known for his use of advanced surgical techniques to transform men and women’s body shape and appearance.
Dr. Kreithen performs cosmetic breast and body contouring procedures including breast augmentation, breast lift, breast reduction, abdominoplasty (tummy tuck), mommy makeovers, lower body lifts, arm & thigh lifts, SmartLipo liposuction, Cellulaze anti-cellulite treatment, ThermiTight skin tightening, as well as non-invasive procedures such as Botox and Juvederm.
Dr. Kreithen is a member of the American Society of Plastic Surgery, and is Chief of Surgery at Lakewood Ranch Medical Center. Dr. Kreithen completed his plastic surgery fellowship at the University of Florida and graduated from Temple University Medical School in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
For more information about Joshua Kreithen, M.D. or to schedule a consultation, please visit http://www.sarasota-med.com/plastic-surgery-office-sarasota/cosmetic-surgeon/ or call 941-365-8679.
About Holcomb – Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa
Holcomb – Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa offers a comprehensive range of aesthetic surgical and non-surgical treatments that enhance the lives of men and women. The founding physicians of the practice include J. David Holcomb, M.D. (Facial Plastic and Cosmetic Laser Surgeon) and Joshua Kreithen, M.D. (Breast and Body Contouring Specialist). An Aesthetic and Wellness Medicine specialist, Dr. Andrea Kreithen, is available to help patients refine their appearance and optimize their inner physical well-being and health.
The practice is renowned for its expertise in facial plastic surgery, plastic surgery of the breasts and body, and cosmetic laser surgery. The AAAASF-certified facility includes a private outpatient ambulatory surgical center. Its MedSpa offers numerous options for minimally invasive and non-surgical contouring of the face and body and state-of-the-art laser and skin care.
The Holcomb – Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa staff is comprised of an extraordinary group of professionals whose primary goal is the safety and care of their patients in their beautiful downtown Sarasota location. They are committed to treating patients and each other with kindness, compassion and dignity at all times. For more information, please visit http://www.sarasota-med.com .
